body_html:
Thanks @drpngx @martinwicke for the review. I updated the PR so that now negative indices will be dropped silently, bring in behaviors of GPU and CPU closer.

I do notice another discrepancy between GPU and CPU. In GPU the bad index (> num_segments) are ignored as well while in CPU greater than num_segments will results in error. Not sure the best way to handle this situation. Any suggestions about that?
